fields.name: Offer Status:
fields.value:
Great!
Reviews: 5 Stars!
Only $19.99 per month.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- May roll in any slot, after this is rolled, you will instantly reroll for free but your next role will keep the GIM++ Perks!!!.
**- GIM++ Perks:**
- You may make your vote count as 2 and 1/10 of a vote secretly at any time.
- You may reroll your role slot in the middle of the game once, keeping the GIM++ Perks!!!.
- You may Self-target and Multitask up to 4 different Abilities/Factional actions.
- You learn the role of cleaned targets and also talk to them for one night after they die.
- You may send a single message publicly or to your evil faction chat after death. And then another one if you really want to.
